job_description:
Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/Architect - Qlik Sense, MicroStrategy On behalf of our client in the Healthcare Sector, PROCOM is looking for a Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/Architect - Qlik Sense, MicroStrategy.
Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/Architect - Qlik Sense, MicroStrategy– Job Description

We are seeking a Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/ Architect with expertise in Qlik Sense and MicroStrategy
The successful candidate will work remotely, designing, developing, testing, and deploying Qlik-based visualizations, dashboards, and reports
This role requires a high level of proficiency in Qlik Sense development, data modeling, and dashboard/visualization creation
The Senior BI Developer/Architect will be responsible for the implementation of Qlik-based visualizations, dashboards, and reports, including Qlik data models, security models, and backend integration with AWS S3/Redshift
The role also involves embedding these elements in Drupal-based web pages through mashups, following approved architecture design, AODA (WCAG 2.0) compliance, bilingual (Eng/FR) requirements, and User Experience provided wireframes and Information Architecture directives


Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/Architect - Qlik Sense, MicroStrategy– Mandatory Skills

4+ years of experience in Business Intelligence development utilizing Qlik Sense and MicroStrategy
Experience migrating existing applications from MicroStrategy to Qlik Sense and leading the technical solutions for using Qlik
The candidate should also have experience working with Qlik extensions like VizLib, developing data transformations in Qlik Sense, creating QVD files, and set analysis
Experience with Qlik Management Console, including Management, Security rules, and Maintenance of tasks, extensions, streams, and apps is also required


Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/Architect - Qlik Sense, MicroStrategy- Preferred Skills

Experience in the healthcare industry is a plus
Excellent knowledge of SQL, including performance tuning of SQL queries, and experience in coaching/training an in-house team in learning Qlik


Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/Architect - Qlik Sense, MicroStrategy- Assignment Start Date ASAP – 5 months to start
Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Developer/Architect - Qlik Sense, MicroStrategy- Assignment Location Toronto, ON – Work Remotely
